title: Crossing Rough Waters: A Journey From Fear to Freedom
description: Crossing Rough Waters is about our faith journey. God will see us through, especially during life's challenges. These rough spots can provide lessons to help us grow stronger. Be faithful. Be unique. Be God's gift in the world. This is a message of hope. If you are seeking more joy in your life and possess the courage to realize your potential and to grow, this is a book you will treasure.
author: Sarah Payne Naylor
